228857057.text: "CHK1 is inhibited at the normal G2/M transition by Polo like kinase (PLK) 1 mediated phosphorylation and degradation of claspin XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR, a key regulator of CHK1 activity, as well as by CDK1 and CyclinB dependent inhibitory phosphorylation events in late G2, triggering nuclear export of CHK1 and therefore limiting substrate accessibility 18."
